titles.title: To permit the Asphalt Commander to be placed under a foreign registry.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 11/3/2000--Introduced. Permits the ship Asphalt Commander to be: (1) transferred to or placed under a foreign registry; or (2) sold to a person who is not a U.S. citizen and transferred to or placed under such a registry.
